ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Kenneth J. Smith ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. KENNETH J. SMITH, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia Court, effective October 31, 2012.
